name: n8n
short_description: Workflow automation platform with AI and 400+ integrations.
description: Workflow automation platform with AI and 400+ integrations. n8n is a self-hosted application focused on productivity, tools, automation, workflow. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose. It supports a wide range of use cases for homelabs and self-hosted infrastructure.
usecases: Self-host n8n on your home server to workflow automation platform with ai and 400+ integrations without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use n8n to manage your productivity workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
